title: Why MVC is so important
info: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their code between the Model layer for data, the View layer for design, and the Controller layer for application logic.

title: Authentication vs. Authorization
info: There is a difference between authentication and authorization. Austhentication means confirming your own identity, whereas authorization means beign allowed access to the system.

title: Object-Relational Mapping
info: I have really loved learning about ORMs. It's really simplified the way I create queries!
